scripts.test:build: dotnet fable tests/Client --outDir tests/Client/output --run webpack -p --config webpack.tests.config.js
scripts.test:live: dotnet fable tests/Client --outDir tests/Client/output --run webpack-dev-server --config webpack.tests.config.js

startdocs.darwin: NODE_ENV=development dotnet fable watch ./src/Docs --outDir src/Docs/output --run npm-run-all -s -p postcss:watch parcel:serve:docs

startdocs.win32: set NODE_ENV=development& dotnet fable watch ./src/Docs --outDir src/Docs/output --run npm-run-all -s -p postcss:watch parcel:serve:docs
